website_summaries.verdict: A good signal that can pass through walls makes it ideal for locating items in or near your home.
pros: A light on the remote helps to locate lost items in the dark
Works within 20 to 30 ft. of fob
cons: Shape of fob makes them difficult to attach to items other than keys

customer_reviews.title: Wife, kids, cat....All tracked!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my cat, dog, kid, and wife. Now I know when my wife is in the other room texting her BF and I know when my kids have run off with the neighbor boy because I can't hear the beep. My cat, she sleeps all day so it's nice to wakes her up with the beeping to get her off the couch and motivated to loose some weight. I still loose my keys, but my family.....is never lost.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Key Finder and I liked it so much I got a 2nd one after I gifted mine to my daughter (she always looses her keys and causes lots of problems with her husband). This vendor is the coolest ever and they will stand by their product, so rest assure that if you don't like (can't imagine why) or if the product stops working this company has your back. This is a simple solution to find things, I have one on my remote, one in my wallet and my keys - 3 things I'm always looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Blujaykat

customer_reviews.title: LIFE IS SO MUCH EASIER. IF YOU LOSE YOUR KEYS ALL THE TIME YOU WILL LOVE THIS SIMPLY SOLUTION.
customer_reviews.text: This has made my life so much easier. My husband is thinking of duct taping one to the remote control. You get 4 and you have to keep the locator in the same place. I swear this will save you sooooooo much time and that horrible feeling when you are late and cannot find your keys. Get it don't hesitate. AWESOME CHRISTMAS OR WHATEVER YOU CELEBRATE GIFT.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Andahubby

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome but remotes stopped working after 2 months. The company contacted me and offered to replace the product or give me a refund. I asked for a replacement because I need a keyfinder in my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Janae Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This has been so great with my pets!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so great to have. I have two small dogs, and one young cat. The young cat keeps ending up outside on top of the roof. With this thing, I can very quickly track down where the cat is. As for the dogs, they are so funny. If I set off one of their RF beepers, they come running lickity split. I don't think all dogs were act that way, but it sure is convenient for me. We put the forth RF beeper on the tv remote control. I notice that the battery lasts a long time. Btw, my cat is out in all kinds of weather, and this thing keeps working!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gilbert-O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: This is not nearly loud enough. Any item that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not nearly loud enough. Any item that is lost under pillows or clothes or couch cushions will not be found because you can't hear the beeping. Totally worthless for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a Year
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly the whole setup stopped working. Fresh batteries did not help. Seemed like a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Evans Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it for about 9 months. I only have one set of keys to worry about so I put the battery in the red fob and attached it to my keys. Maybe used it 3 times before the battery died. Rather than buy new batteries, I swapped out the fob - installed a battery in the blue one and started using that one instead. Now that one has died, have used it maybe 5 or 6 times. No warning of low battery, so when you're in a crunch and have no time to look for keys, and the battery dies, it defeats the purpose. I would have spent a few more dollars on something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT FOR REMOTES
customer_reviews.text: This product is not appropriate for remote controls for two main reasons First the sensor is not designed to stick to the remote. I had to tie it down with a rubber band. Second the alarm sound is too low, especially if the remote is under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Al Jaleel

customer_reviews.title: Great little key finder!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2yr old daughter at home and she has started hiding keys and remotes so my wife and I decided on this little thing. It works great and is plenty load. I have heard the beep all the way from a different floor of my house. Only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is cause taking the battery cover off was pretty difficult on the trackers. When I went to open them the soft plastic began to move and scratch the cover. Other than that it is a great solution to my daughters game of hide and seek lol.
customer_reviews.author: Poman

customer_reviews.title: Not a TV remote finder! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a tv remote finder. The only way it can find the remote is if it is able to stay on the remote and there is no way to attach it to the remote. The little pea side double stick pad does not even last one sitting. It may work great for a key chain but it is a waste of money for the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought in August and it stopped working 3 months later! Stay away....
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It has solved our "can't find the keys" issue. We have a different color for each set of keys and one for the living room remote. All well and good, but the plastic is flimsy... The pieces that come off for the battery now have sharp edges because nothing I could find opened them (even a perfectly shaped rubber spoon I used on the last one) was able to make the tiny turn to lock and unlock without damaging it. Works well, but if I have to change the batteries more than 3 or 4 times I'll probably have to resort to tape.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Loud and pitchy, easy to use, cuts down frustration!
customer_reviews.text: No more blame game on who lost the remotes! May have saved my marriage 😆! It arrived nicely packaged. Batteries were included but not in devices. Clear directions and easy to insert. We bought covers for our remotes just so we could attach these as we are constantly losing them in the furniture and toy boxes. We used the included key rings. Our remotes are small and are angled which would have made for a very awkward hold had we used the included sticky pads so I can’t say whether they are good for use or not. Overall a great quality product which has made finding lost items so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a short amount of time
customer_reviews.text: They are a game changer for animal parents for sure but they randomly stop working for days then start working again so I have to swap em between my 3 cats which is annoying but when they do work they help me find my cats easily even when they hide in or under something .. would love it more if they didn't glitch but all in all a decent purchase I guess,...... Update November 17 2019 all 4 have stopped working now and I've had to replace the batteries 4x already so pretty upset it only lasted 5 months .. the purple one stopped working months ago too so there's that
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Eh. My remote came broken. The face of it detached and the glue was all over the buttons...I was able to fix it then scrub the glue off. The alarm isnt extremely loud if under something. So if ur using for a tv remote it maybe difficult to hear unless ur really listening...but everyones different I guess. I would NOT suggest using it for a tv remote tho. I bought this because my kids kept losing the firestick. The alarms are super bulky...I can see using for keys but honestly i cant see this being used for much more seeing it's a sight for sore eyes. The concept is cool but really nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Esky made it right.
customer_reviews.text: It is important to let the company you purchase from know if there is a problem with the product. This was brought home to me after I placed my review here. The Esky company contacted me and offered a refund or replacement. Since I realize that it is impossible not to have a few items that don’t always work up to standard and I really want to be able to use the locators I opted for a replacement. This was done in an efficient manner and I now am able to locate my Alzheimer husbands remote. This is the type of customer service I thought was long gone. Thank you Esky. Patricia Walling
customer_reviews.author: TRAINPATCH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find my items now
customer_reviews.text: Definitely like this. The only thing that I don't like is that it is difficult to use with a television remote control. Oh, for my keys, it is easy to hang with a keyring onto my set of keys. Since the remotes are poofy (curved, rounded), it is difficult to attach to a curvy shape of my television remote. I solved this by looping a rubberband through the keyring of the locator, then wrapping the rubberband around the TV remote. So it works and can be used with the curvy items, but it would be nice if there was a way to attach it a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to attach to TV remotes for when they get lost in couch cushions, or in the bed among the covers. Forget it. The beep that they produce is barely audible 5 feet away in a dead silent room. If the tiny hole for the beeper is covered in any way its completely useless. So unless what you are looking for is within arms reach.......AND...........in a completely silent environment.......AND........the tiny hole for the beeper is not obscured by anything at all.........then this is not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Croyle

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Losing my keys for hours is what prompted this buy and considering the fact my daughter has inherited the same annoying habit of misplacing keys (despite having hooks near the door for our keys) this was a must have..should have been had type of purchase. I even took the advice of other reviewers and put one on my remote control and my daughter has attached one to her wallet because yeah she always misplace that too. I just popped 2 AAA batteries in the remote, inserted the batteries into the fob and viola...easy peasy no more lost keys-ees.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini68

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This would actually be a wonderful product if the receivers were less bulky. The system works as it should but the receivers are much to big and bulky to put on tv remotes, in particular. They also do not stay in place or even stuff to the device you’re trying to keep track of. They’d be great for keeping track of keys because you can attach them to a key ring as you would a fob. However, as a tv remote finder they just are not very practical at all. I’m really disappointed with this product because I bought it specifically to keep track of tv remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Delysia56

customer_reviews.title: 11 Months Later...doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great way to avoid frustration by allowing us to keep track of misplaced keys. After installing batteries and checking to make sure all was working, I felt a great deal of relief since my husband often misplaces his keys. Yesterday, for the first time, it was put to the test. The Esky does not work as keys cannot be located. I tested my keys since I know exactly where they are and same results: No sound, no nothing. I checked the receiver batteries, changed receiver batteries and still nothing. What a worthless piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about battery life yet but overall it seems to work really well. I was pretty cheap so i didnt expect much but it works really well! Range is decent, I wouldn't expect it to go that far i havent tested it. For general use I recommend this. The FOB (idk what else to call it) is a pretty thick so it can't really attach to much else but it came with some velcro so I put it on the TV remote. Just enough force to keep it on there. If you have kids younger then like 16 it's falling off the remote lol
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Does the job although a bulky addition to your key ring. The advertised "up to 30 meter range" is a tad optimistic. I've found that 15 meters is about all you can expect in a house (intervening walls, etc) -- or, practically, just how far you can really hear the sound. Customer service is good. 3 year followup: Still functioning-- however battery life is extremely poor. Seems as if the key fob batteries discharge in a month or two even when the unit is not used. Inevitably find the batteries are dead on the infrequent times when I actually need it. Plan on checking frequently to see if unit is still working.
customer_reviews.author: hr

customer_reviews.title: Best. Thing. Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have spent thousands of dollars on Amazon (I am ashamed to say I have lined Bezo's pockets on my poor teacher's salary) and this is the ONLY thing I use every day. This is the ONLY thing I have purchased that is worth every single penny. I have a beeper attached to my phone, the firestick remote, my keys, my husband's keys, and my son's favorite stuffed animal. (All with duct tape bc there's real attachment - only downside). And we use it Every. Single. Day. I'm so grateful for this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Land

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it is shown
customer_reviews.text: It is almost bigger than my remote control. I paid 6 usd for return. I tried other brands all batteries were included. You need to buy 2 aaa batteries to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Sacid

customer_reviews.title: Not good size for cat collar/Smiley Face ones are cute
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really comment on how well these work because I didn’t use them. I had purchased them to put on a kitty’s collar, but they are way too big for that. I even have a 15 pound cat who is not small, but they were still too big. Update to review..... I received a different set that were round with a smiley face on them. Those are working well for my cat. It makes it very easy to find him. Additionally, the sellers customer service was great! They reached out to me regarding the item and even replaced the set of trackers when one quit working after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana sports parent

customer_reviews.title: Work for awhile
customer_reviews.text: After about a year, I enjoy these and they worked well for the first 5 months, but batteries died and then when we replaced the with the same kind the connection wasn't getting much better. If something is covering them they wont usually go off. You then had to start point the remote right at the item and sometimes it would even lag for a while or just not go off at all. EDIT: The company contacted me after mine stopped working and gave me a new set so hopefully these will work better :)
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: A Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: It works from across the house, I can hear it beep from inside drawers, inside purses, inside pockets. Since our family of 4 are all working from home during the covid lockdown, we don't need individual cars, and all drive the one plug-in car (powered by solar panels). People often forget to put the key fob back. Instead of asking who used the car last, going through a history of who drove where, everyone checking pockets and purses, we can now just push the button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon John

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: It isn't a flashy product but it does exactly what is needed and it is very simple to use (and it is cheap). My Mom doesn't use a smart phone so the fancy solutions that require a smart phone to help find keys etc. won't work. This product is cheap and simple to use and it does the job. The receivers that you attach to your keys etc. are a bit fat (it would be a bit better if they were a bit smaller) but overall it is a product that solves a very annoying problem for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: John Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Didn’t know I really needed this. I put a receiver on my robot vacuum so I can find it when it gets stuck under something, one on my phone cause Find my IPhone beeps all my items, not just my main phone. Fixing to put one on my remote too. If I had a husband, surely he would have one stuck on him also.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Love this, as we are constantly losing remotes. Only downfall is the double sided sticky they give you to attach the finder is very thick. It made a big gap between the finder and the remote and It seemed like it would make the finder get knocked off easily. Instead I used a command strip ( a lot thinner) and it works very well. The finders are a little bit but you get used to it when using your remote. We have one on our Firestick, and since its kind of big we attached it to the front of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: not for small pets or small things
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, but the receiver carries a 2032 battery (used in the BIOS of PCs) and these batteries are very large and increase the size of the device, and for this reason it can be very uncomfortable to use them in small pets (it can work in pets and large things) and the maximum range is less than 30 meters.
customer_reviews.author: alejc

customer_reviews.title: Better for keys/update :awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't necessarily what I was looking for. They're kind of oblong spheretype shapes. I figured they would be more flat on the opposite side. They're more key fobs. I wanted something I could tape to the TV remotes. They come with adhesive circles about a 1/4 inch wide that are essentially garbage for TV remote-related location finding with kids. They do as advertised except for more keyring-less applications. UPDATE: had customer service contact me. Offered to give me the flatter version free of charge! Hopefully this will be a better fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Only have one complaint
customer_reviews.text: So my overall thoughts on this product is that it's a great value for the money. Other products similar to this have too many fancy features that jack up the price to unpalatable numbers. My wife loses here wallet and keys all the time. So that was the main reason for this purchase. My only complaint is that the fobs are a big bigger than they really need to be. And the overall feel of the fobs is cheap. BUT, they do exactly what they're designed to do. The alarm is very loud and the range is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bike N Bird

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, attached to car keys, works throughout entire house and through wood/drywall walls; distance is farther than you can hear (more than 100 feet through walls). Can activate on one side of house, dispatch kids to search for key, and they will find it, even when keys are under pillows, in drawers, or sofa cushions. Used other high tech trackers which required email and wifi/cell signal with smartphone app, but I don't need to track my location, or use as GPS tracker. I just need to find the key, in the house, when I need the keys.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used to use another brand and think that I've been spoiled. I figured this set was a fraction of the price so wanted to give it a try. I attached one to my keys, threw it under the couch and pushed on the remote. Nothing. Walked closer....nothing. It wasn't until I was literally standing next to the couch when it finally went off. I tried another color. That one worked better. Maybe the first was a doozy. Either way, you get what you pay for. Update 1/17/19 - The company reached out to me directly and offered a replacement. The new item works just fine. This one worked from throughout my two-story row home. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Chen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful But Could be Made More Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The Idea behind this is quite good. The size of the transmitter and the receivers is good. But there are a couple of problems with thiis item. First, the sound of the beeper is not loud enough. I can hear it if I am in the same room as the beeper, but not if I am in another room. Second, the receiver does not beep long enough. It only beeps for 5 seconds. It needs to beep for at least 20 second.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Kasten

customer_reviews.title: Battery eater
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Had mine about six months quit using it. Got tired of changing batteries. That's been 3 years ago I found them in the drawer the other day and decided to write a bad review so I did. They contacted me and said they would like to send me another set so I said sure. So far so good. Who in the world would of thought that a company would be that caring to send you a replacement after 3 years. Would have given it a higher rating but waiting to see how long the batteries last this time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Do you loose things? GET this!
customer_reviews.text: Well. I am in my early 60's. If my head wasn't connected, I would put it down and walk away. THIS little gem is a life (sanity) saver I have one on my Cell Phone... yea. I know. But I loose it at home more than I carry it. One on my TV Remote and one on my Vape Mod. I have worn the battery out on the one on my Vape and Cell Phone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband who is always losing his keys, wallet etc. he attached one of the buttons to my set of keys-- I was pleasantly surprised with how lightweight and small the key chain is. So far, we've only had to use this once -- after 10 min of searching, it helped us locate hubby's keys (which were in the pocket of the jacket he was wearing.) if it wasn't for this key finder, we might still be searching... Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I can now find all my remotes in a house with a 7 yr old, 4 yr old and 1 yr old. They work exactly as described and make the remote bulkier so it can’t slip behind the couch or in cracks as easy as before Cons: the Velcro on the back to attach it to the remote can be ripped off. My 1 yr old son does this from time to time which takes away the purpose of the remote finder. Overall I would 100% buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: No long works after just 2 months of use. With all the high ratings, I don't know if I just got a bad one or not. There are only a few complaints of non-working issues. Unfortunately I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: No more lost keys!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has been playing a game I do NOT like for the last 7 years, "where did I put my keys down". It has not been a fun game over the years, but now it is a breeze! The range on this is MAGNIFICENT! If his keys are anywhere in the house, it goes off with the push of a button. I now no longer have to spend tons of time trying to figure out where on earth he put them down. I've threatened to add this to his wallet as well.. if he can ever find it so I can do so.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me because I had a scare, couldn't find my keys anywhere and they're expensive to replace! Fortunately they were found, but to prevent this from happening again he bought me this gadget. It works well, because I've since lost them once again but found in the house thanks to this . It works so well now my husband has them on HIS keys since it happened to him also. I've got one on my purse too, Nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not LOUD Enough
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to get the thing going, you don't need an internet wireless connection, all you need for operation is included (EXCEPT the 2 AAA batteries not easily known or notified of). It all works great - EXCEPT it's not loud enough. Just a little beep and for those of us who are hearing challenged, this is a big problem. It's too much trouble to undo all the packaging and send it back so I'm just going to keep it but BUYER BEWARE - This thing is really low in volume.
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

customer_reviews.title: Batteries last less than 8 months with 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I found out the hard way my batteries had died when I was looking for my keys a few days ago. I bought this about 8 months ago and I tested it once the first time I put the batteries in. I actually needed it a few days ago and it didn't work. Going to be looking for a different brand now, something that lasts at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Great for lost keys
customer_reviews.text: My husband loses his keys more than any person I know, and after many mornings of frantic searching for his keys leading to a very cranky attitude I bought these. We put one on his key ring and one in his wallet, and we have used it quite a bit since we set it up. It's loud enough to be found easily, and it seriously gets the job done. I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Great for finding your remote or anything else you need to find
customer_reviews.text: OK I don’t know about you but I lose my remote all the time. What I did was I bought a cover for my remote that has a small hole in the bottom and then I put the locator into the remote. I love this product all I have to do is push the button and it beats to find my remote. Would highly highly recommend this product to anyone who loses their remote.
customer_reviews.author: dawn bosley

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t lost the tv remote since!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Battery life so far is forever, and I rarely even have to use the alarm part bc just the attached tracker dangles off the remote and makes noise. One of the easiest and best purchases I ever made. You don’t realize how stressful it can be when you lose the same thing multiple times a day and then all of a sudden being able to find it lol, I’m literally less angry
customer_reviews.author: RyanElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A Gadget to Make Life Easy
customer_reviews.text: I like it that the Key Finder has 4 receivers to attach the items into so you could track 4 items in one Finder unit. Attached them to TV remote control, key holder, wallet and my eyeglasses--items i find very important in my day-to-day activities. No need to attach a receiver to my cellphone because I can always ask Alexa to call it and make it ring whenever I misplace it. Makes my life easier especially when you leave home and can't find either your keys, your wallet or eyeglasses which would refrain you from leaving until you find them.
customer_reviews.author: tomons

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through a rather costly experience of losing my spare set of new car keys. while waiting to replace them I got this for my existing ones. Within 5 minutes of opening package I attached to my keys my phone and 2 remotes. I went upstairs with receiver and tested sound. I still heard the beeping. Tip.... get small colored dots to stick next to each color on receiver, i wrote on each one to remind me what goes with what,
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a husband who constantly asks “where are my keys?” This is the gift for you. Although my husband swears he always puts his keys “in the same spot” or constantly blames our kids for taking them this has saved me so much time!! Now when he says “babe where are my keys?!?! I can’t find them and I swear I put them right here!!!!” I just press the button and *beep beep beep*. Tada life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I lost the remote too many times. To mollify my teenagers, I attached the disc to my keys, placed one in my bag, and I’m deciding where to use the others. I want to put one on my phone but it isn’t a flat / sleek disc, it’s a bit thick. Great item though, easy to set up, easy to use, does just as it says it will. Reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Too Thick!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic fobs are entirely too thick for what they contain. I ended up cracking one open to get the internals out, and sliding them into a cellphone case (my mom loses hers often)
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: It does as it describes. I ordered this because I've gotten into RC flying and wanted to locate my RC helicopter when it goes down in the cornfield. I expected them to be louder and they don't pickup within the distance I need after a crash landing. Sometimes they will chime on first click, other times 6-7 clicks before it starts beeping (that's right in front of it and about 30ft away pointed right at them.) But many times I have needed something like these to locate things I use and lose alot, so its loud enough and they do have many uses. Very sleek, clean, simple easy to use design. For the price I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: James Burgett

customer_reviews.title: I waited months to make sure this product will survive ...
customer_reviews.text: I waited months to make sure this product will survive before I posted a review. I misplace my keys and wallet all the time and this thing helped me find them. With kids around the house playing with these buttons, it sure sirvived the hardcore pressing and it still works perfectly. It makes a beeping sound when the button is pressed so you would know where the sound is coming from only downside is, if someone is sitting on the beeper, you'd have a hard time locating it and it'll have to be very quiet for you to hear that faint beeping sound. If it's just lying around somewhere, then you won't have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bong

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit to purchase if you misplace your keys, TV remote or cell phone. I purchased this unit and placed a colored sensor on my cell phone, TV remote and car keys. Works as advertised! If you misplace something, just push the colored button on the pager unit that corresponds with the unit your looking for, and the sensor will emit a loud beep! If you keys are in the basement and you are upstairs and can't hear the "Beep" just walk through the house, with the pager to basement, etc.. until you hear it! Great unit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. L.C. Holifield

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 8 months later
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad less than a year and it isn’t working. I’ve changed all the batteries. Worked great until 8 months later. I would hope to expect it to last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jojojuice

customer_reviews.title: As many people have said about the product they received, it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for us. The problem is that it has stopped working and I cannot figure out what went wrong with it. The light comes up when I press the remote control but the receiver doesn't go off. I replaced the remote batteries but kept all original batteries on the receivers. Still not working. I replaced one of the CR2032 batteries on the receiver that is being used... Still doesn't work. I am ordering a set of CR2032 batteries and replacing them all. I hope this works!
customer_reviews.author: NuMom2014

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got it on 2 sets of keys and used it a couple times. So far no problems with battery life, only been using 2 months so we'll see how that goes. The fob that goes on the key ( or other item) is bulky with a key ring, but not overly so. Not the highest quality. The face on remote is not properly aligned, so the buttons don't line up, but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 7 months, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 7 months but the company took care of it! Worked initially when got it but then had to finally use it and none of them beeped. Even with new batteries in the remote. Making the system pointless. Left bad review and the company reached out to me immediately with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Sent a free replacement with expedited shipping right away. Now my TV remotes are safe again.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Esky Key Finder
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to my remote. If you have a Samsung Remote One, you understand why I had to have this item. I was constantly losing mine in a dimly lit room. The Key finder causes the tag placed on the remote to send an audible alarm as well as a flashing light. This has been a life saver for me on several occasions. I bought this device in late January 2018 and have not had to change them yet. It uses a standard 2032 battery in the tag and AAA batteries in the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo Bill

customer_reviews.title: ... to whatever you don't want to lose comes off easily. I would not trust that it would stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Sticky stuff that holds these buttons to whatever you don't want to lose comes off easily. I would not trust that it would stay on very long. 2 of 4 buttons fell off within one month. Cover that holds the battery into the buttons also came off within a month with regular use (I had it on the back of my cellphone). Overall, very cheaply made and not tested at all otherwise they would have found these glaring product defects.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Herchenbach

customer_reviews.title: Works  wonderful  for the price
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it. I wanted something easy to operate for my senior parents. My father lost my spare keys to my car and his own keys all in a weeks time for about 2 weeks. Now there is one of the keychains on all keys. All batteries you can buy at a dollar store sure the battery life would probably not be the best. But it would be a cheap way of replacing batteries. I tried this on the outside of my house which is brick and it worked. Total impressed with this for the money. Think about buying another one for the tv remote and some other things that my senior parents loose. Lol
customer_reviews.author: joyce holliday

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my find my keys multiple times and for that I’m very grateful. The batteries are just watch batteries that you can find at Walmart or target and they give you some replacements with the product to begin with alone with some tiny key rings for your keys. I like the color coordination. I do wish there a spot to write which color coordinated with which set of keys (or remote if that’s what you used it for). Great product overall and has saved me from being late to work multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Little Tiger

customer_reviews.title: It has saved my butt, and I know it will in the future!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people that looses their keys and wallet all the time. My keys were actually hidden in the couch for 2 or 3 weeks once, and I had to use one of my husband's during that time. On the bright side, our house got really, really clean haha! I bought this for when I eventually found them, and put it on the key ring immediately! It's not too loud, but it does get your attention. And it's great for in the morning getting ready for work and you're in a hurry trying to find your wallet after spending all that money online last night!
customer_reviews.author: Chibi

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works so well. Press the button and release and the beeping sound can be heard. Finds items in other rooms, under cushions, in drawers and in purses. Has worked well each time it has been needed. The flashlight comes in handy and although I thought I would not use it, I was wrong. Well made, attractive and easy to use. Highly recommend, if you are like me, and lose your keys or phone more often than I want to admit. Has made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of different "Key Finders" out there some are more hi-tech than others. This one isn't very hi-tech, but it's very simple and easy to use. It seems to be made well. I'm not sure about the battery life since I haven't had it long enough to know. It comes with 4 watch batteries for the key FOBs and you have to supply 2 AAA's for the remote. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you are trying to locate a TV remote or something like that.
customer_reviews.text: But the little transponders DO NOT STICK to key chain fobs or much of anything else (like your cell phone) if you are putting them into and taking them out of your pockets. As for the TV remotes (we have several), we had to put the transponder into a 1 gallon plastic bag, stuck onto any one of them, so if the little sticky things you're supposed to put on anything come OFF, at least you can locate the BAG with the transponder that failed to stick onto anyting.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price. Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: The batteries are very easy to install. Up and running within minutes. I like the fact that the key finder uses a remote control rather than a smart phone. Very easy to read. Color coding is good too. When you hit the remote, the keyfinder beeps. I can hear it several rooms away! The ovals are a little bit thick, but I put one in my husband's wallet, and it works OK there. Good product. Reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Witte

customer_reviews.title: good packaging. Got one before and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, good packaging. Got one before and it works great. Some limitations with distance and intervening walls, just like your WI-Fi so don't expect it to work from outside the house, the yard etc. Just test it to set its limits. Worked well for me, so I got one for my mother. She misplaces her wallet/change purse all the time and she gets upset when she cannot find it. She is in Greece and the construction is concrete and bricks with stucco on the walls, so I don't know how it will work there. I'll update when she tells me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not secure backs, bulky
customer_reviews.text: In addition to title, the battery cover CAME APART in my pocket. Amazing that it could just pop off like that. Battery and back are now lost.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I misplace my keys all the time. I hooked one on my purse and one on my keys. Signal works great. I gave my sister this set too. She has already had to use to find keys. I’m looking to see if they sell just the receiver so I can put in my purse so if I’m gone off I have a receiver with me at all times in case I lay my keys down. Etc. very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Line Dancing

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this very long and so far there have been no issues. Unfortunately I haven't misplaced my keys since I got it so I haven't been able to test it as much as I would like. This would have been a great thing to have when I was packing for my move a couple of months back as I could have attached the fobs to things I needed to pack but would need to be able to find sooner than later. But I like it well enough that I will order another as a gift. I am not the only person in my family who misplaces things.
customer_reviews.author: magill1986

customer_reviews.title: Works well but a bit bulky
customer_reviews.text: Well, we used to lose the TV remote several times a week and this remote alarm has made it easy to find. There are only two problems: 1) it is pretty bulky (a bit larger that the remote for a car) 2) it’s held on by velcro, so our toddler keeps pulling it off the remote
customer_reviews.author: nonchalanthippo

customer_reviews.title: Great cat tracking device
customer_reviews.text: Similar to some other reviewers, we bought this item to help us find our cat when he's outside. It's a little large to attach to a cat collar, but after securing it with a fat rubber band, our cat tolerates it. The remote range isn't great, but I would estimate that it works within 10-15 feet. Beeper is loud enough that you can hear it if you're within range, but it's not loud enough to scare our cat when it goes off. Overall, very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: gclive

customer_reviews.title: so pleased with customer service!
customer_reviews.text: update - I purchased this for my aging parents who were misplacing keys and purses regularly. It was exactly what they needed until it stopped working. I’ve replaced batteries and still get nothing. It worked for about 9 months. Very sad to see it fail now. Second update! I contacted the company and they quickly responded to let me know they would replace the product for us. I was so pleased with their customer service! We should receive the replacement shortly and will be thrilled to have it to rely on when wallets or purses are misplaced. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SFORD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend’s mom(she loses her keys so frequently and I’m tired of listening to her throw a fit about losing them). Product came exactly as described. They’re all lightweight and I like the color coordination. I split the devices up between my friend’s mom’s vehicle keys and his (they share vehicles from time to time). They’re not too bulky and don’t get in the way of the rest of their keychains. The lady I gave them to is deaf in one ear, and she can hear the beep clearly and is able to now find her key within 10 seconds of pressing the button on the remote!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: No more losing remotes!
customer_reviews.text: I have to small children, so we were constantly losing all of our remotes almost every day. Toddlers seem to hide things very well. We have 3 nvidia shields in our home. The downside is the remotes just like the fire tv remote are very small & easy to misplace. I placed a small peice of double sided 3M tape on the back of our remotes and now we never lose our remotes. Range is great! Just dont lose the key Finder remote :)
customer_reviews.author: California-Space-X

customer_reviews.title: These things have saved me more than a few minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: These things have saved me more than a few minutes in the morning. My daughter will walk off with my keys and 'hide' them... I walk the house with the remote and find them in less than a minute. I have one taped to the Amazon Fire remote, on 2 sets of keys and one is standing by waiting to replace the first one that dies. Held up for 6 months and I don't see why I wouldn't be using them for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Now my daughter and family can find remotes and car keys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift, she can never find the tv remote, her car keys so I got this for her and her family. I don't think she has used it yet but I'm sure she will once she uses it. It has 4 different things she can use to find her remotes and keys so she and family should be good.
customer_reviews.author: straw

customer_reviews.title: Great for locating Pets...but not waterproof...
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly to locate keys, pets, electronics, etc. without having to use a smartphone/Bluetooth. We used it on the collar of our deaf cat, so that we could find him when he hides (being deaf, he doesn't come when called). The only issue we had was that the battery compartment is not waterproof, and the keytag (where the battery is) dropped into his water bowl when he drank. It stopped working... But we still have 3 other colored keytags to use...we just have to figure out how to make it waterproof so it doesn't happen again... By the way, four coin-style batteries come with the four keytags!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: "She Cant Find Her Keys"
customer_reviews.text: Anyone remember that song by Paul Peterson from Donna Reed? Well you wont lose your keys after you attach this nifty item to your key ring. Its not super loud but loud enough to hear. Works as advertised and its color coded too. Bought a second one for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: B White

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 7 months
customer_reviews.text: My husband relied on this. He has 4 sets of keys he is always losing. This tracker was a lifesaver for him. Today it quit working. We thought it just needed fresh batteries, but we changed batteries and the transmitter still doesn't work. I know it doesn't cost that much, but I would think that it should last longer than 7 months! Very disappointed. Now I am shopping for a new tracker.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for lost items!
customer_reviews.text: no more lost anything!!!! I lose my keys and important items often. I am hard of hearing and don't always wear my hearing aids....but I can still hear this. My hearing trouble is "high pitch sounds that I have trouble hearing, but I can still hear this. I just take the "remote" and press the button for the item I have lost and walk around the house with it till i find it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Used on our fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Our 17year old semi blind deaf chihuua used to wander off and get stuck under couch or in corner or if outside in back yard used to get in bushes and we would have hard time finding her . She was deaf so couldnt hear to come so this on collar worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: They really work now my mom find her keys
customer_reviews.text: Now grandma can find her keys put one on her purse the garage remote I made a necklace for the grandkids so we can find them
customer_reviews.author: randy jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great, love the remote, lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loses his keys and his wallet all the time so this was a must have! He put one on his keychain and one in his wallet where he puts his cash at. It doesn't bulge out in his wallet either. It does come with adhesives if you wanted to put it on the back of your phone but he didn't want to do that. We literally use it all the time!! Haha it comes with a little stand to stand the remote up in which is great! It's been a lifesaver! I might put one on my keys haha I love that it comes with so many faabs also!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product for locating things missing around the house!
customer_reviews.text: I am FOREVER losing things... So far I am only using 1 of the 4 locators - on my Kindle... My husband put a rubber band through the transponder, then attached it to my Kindle case. It is BY FAR worth the price. I have about 12 other things (At least) I could use these for. Not sure if I buy multiples if it will work. But I have to say, I am SOOOOOOOO Happy to be able to find my Kindle when I misplace it.
customer_reviews.author: CB06

customer_reviews.title: Battery life problem? Great customer service solution.
customer_reviews.text: The lithium batteries supplied with the fob units all failed after one year. The one time I went to use, one year later, one fob did not respond and further testing of the other three fobs was also non-responsive. I contacted Esky, explained what happened and they very graciously have sent out an entirely new kit. Leslie was very kind and understanding and waived the one year warranty after considering what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Saved my expensive fobs!
customer_reviews.text: My car keys have two expensive fobs on them. This has saved my bacon more than a few times in helping me find my keys more quickly to get to work. One notable time, my keys had somehow gotten hung up on the back corner of some pizza boxes the night before. I never would have found them -in the trash bin, in the garage- without this tracker, as I had no idea where my keys had gone! Paid for itself in that instant. Heartily recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RMF

customer_reviews.title: Helps finds my keys and remotes
customer_reviews.text: The back of the battery holder fell off, I found it, and had someone else put it back together to make sure it was on right. A couple days later, it fell off again, I was unable to find the back door or battery, so I'm down to 3. My advice, duct tape the battery cover on. Otherwise they work fine. Ring alarm could be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This products works great.
customer_reviews.text: Except the bluetooth devices being bulky for the price they totally worth it, It is just you can't attach them to your phone since they are not slim, but you can to remote or key chain etc, I ordered tile 2 of them for my wallet and phone, but other bulky items you don't have to spend too much money (Like Tile), This products works great.
customer_reviews.author: Surendra Puli

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. The pods to attach to device are too big and don't stick on without falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the person who loses everything!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my mom who is constantly misplacing her keys and or phone. We have put the beepers on both items for her, and have set the home base in the kitchen so it is centrally located for her to use when she needs to find them. Seems to be working well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Micheletti

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and works perfect just as described
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad who always misplaces his keys and he LOVED it!! He put on al sets for his diff cars and my moms and his tv remotes haha perfect! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: best of all batteries are replaceable and there's no need ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on scotty kilmer's Channel. this thing works as advertised, best of all batteries are replaceable and there's no need to buy it again like the scammy business model of the tile. This is perfect to find anything you misplaced around your home/car.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mograbi

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre locator
customer_reviews.text: Finally something to help my hubby find his keys! Much easier than training him to hang them on a hook! We also put one in my son's room to alert him when dinner is ready lol! Only 4 stars as we now wish we would've gotten one that can be used with an app on our phones. But this is an excellent alternative. ***Update 10/20/2018*** This worked great for a couple of months, though the signal is weak. Have to be in the same room to locate the item. Now that we've lost the remote control, these are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had it 1 week, saved us twice already - simple
customer_reviews.text: we just moved from a small apartment to a large house. I predicted the misplacement of keys would become a common occurrence in the process of moving. I looked into bluetooth tags and all that but they just seemed to complicated. This is simple and to the point and works. Fiance left her keys in her car about 150 feet away. A little walking, a few button presses, found them no problem.
customer_reviews.author: B. sindelar

product_meta.title: Key Finder, Esky Wireless RF Item Locator, 1 Transmitter with 4 Receivers, Item Tracker with 98ft Working Range and Led Flashlight Function, Key RF Locator, Pet Tracker Wallet Tracker
feature_bullets: 【98ft Long-Distance Tracking】: With the item tracker, you'll be able to find your stuff no matter how far away it is. Advanced radio frequency technology penetrates through walls, doors, cushions, and furniture, locating your items from up to 98ft away.

【4 Key Finders】: With 4 color-coded receivers to attach keys, wallet, remote, glasses, phones, dog collars or other things that are easy lost through the provided keyrings, you can press the matching button to locate them conveniently.

【Sound and Light】: The 4 in 1 wireless RF item locator makes finding your items simpler than ever. Once you press the corresponding button on the remote, just follow the beep sound! Better still, a built-in light on the remote gives better visibility especially in dark places or at night.

【Keep Track of What Matters Most】: Lost your keys? Can't find your wallet? Looking for your dog? The Esky Key Finders take the stress out of lost stuff by easily attaching them to the receivers and then pressing buttons on the remote. You can find your valuables instantly!

【A Great Gift】: When you're scrambling to find your things, this key finder set is the ideal thing you need. No matter use it yourself or send it to your aging parents or forgetful friends, it will definitely make them delightful.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,685 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
